lejos.nxt
Class NXT

java.lang.Object
  lejos.nxt.NXT

public class NXT
extends java.lang.Object

Abstraction for the local NXT device. This version of the NXT class supports remote execution.

Author:
Lawrie Griffiths and Brian Bagnall
